nodes.bodyText: if our artifact is the same between OSes, then don't use platform.os
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -13,15 +13,14 @@ Manifests:
         value: -Xms512m -Xmx512m
         type: STRING
     Artifacts:
-      # TODO: set correct URI
-      - URI: S3:aws.greengrass.nucleus.2.0.0.zip
+      - URI: s3://gg-dev-artifacts/$componentName/$platform.os/$version/aws.greengrass.nucleus.zip

nodes.bodyText: The intention is to fail early if anyone tries to test on windows.
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: You don't need to add a windows platform of course, but there's no need to copy the same artifact in S3 for each platform.
